sentences.sContent: She faked her father’s signature on the cheque.
sentences.sCn: 她在支票上伪造了其父的签名。

sentences.sContent: The insurance company suspected that he had faked his own death.
sentences.sCn: 保险公司怀疑他制造了自己死亡的假象。

sentences.sContent: The results of the experiments were faked.
sentences.sCn: 这些实验的结果都是伪造出来的。

phrases.pCn: 人造革；假裘皮；仿造皮毛

words.tran: 摊贩；骗子；伪造者，伪装者

trans.tranOther: to make something seem real in order to deceive people
made to look like a real material or object in order to deceive people
